personalInfo.name: Dharmendiran E
personalInfo.title: Automation Engineer (SDET)
personalInfo.bio: Crafting robust and scalable automation frameworks to ensure software quality and accelerate development cycles. Passionate about building reliable tests and streamlining CI/CD pipelines for faster, more efficient releases.

about: Hello! I'm Dharmendiran E – Automation Engineer (SDET) with 3.6 years of experience in designing and developing scalable test automation frameworks, AI-driven QA accelerators, and cloud-based testing solutions.
Skilled in Python, Selenium WebDriver, Robot Framework, BDD (Cucumber), REST API testing, SQL, Jenkins, CI/CD, and AWS automation (Boto3).
Hands-on expertise in deploying ML models using AWS SageMaker, building GenAI-powered test scenario generators, and automating cloud infrastructure for QA workflows.
Proven track record of reducing manual testing effort, increasing automation coverage, and expediting release cycles in Agile Scrum environments.

description: Developed and maintained end-to-end automation test scripts using Python, Selenium WebDriver, and Robot Framework, increasing regression test efficiency by 30% and enhancing release stability.
Designed and executed BDD test cases using Gherkin and Cucumber, improving requirement-to-test traceability and collaboration across QA, development, and product teams.
Deployed machine learning models using AWS SageMaker, automating ML operational pipelines and reducing manual intervention by 70% to improve model refresh and monitoring workflows.
Integrated automated test suites into Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, enabling continuous testing, reducing manual execution effort by 40%, and accelerating deployment cycles.
Performed REST API testing using Postman and validated backend data using SQL queries, improving API reliability, data consistency, and system quality across multiple environments.
Automated core AWS services using Python (Boto3) — including Lambda, S3, RDS, Glue, and Redshift — to streamline test environment provisioning, data generation, and workflow orchestration.
Built a GenAI-powered BDD Test Scenario Generator leveraging Confluence documents to automatically create functional and regression test scenarios, reducing test design time by 60%.

Developed QueryStudio AI, a browser-based Text-to-SQL simulation engine that interprets schemas, generates SQL queries, and produces realistic mock data with zero backend dependency, significantly speeding up prototyping and validation.
Collaborated in Agile Scrum environments using JIRA, Zephyr, and Confluence for sprint planning, user story refinement, test management, and release documentation to ensure quality delivery.

projects.title: AI Language Translator
projects.description: A modern, AI-powered language translator that allows users to translate text, voice, and images between various languages. Built with React and TypeScript, this application leverages the Google Gemini API for fast and accurate translations. Key features include real-time text translation, speech-to-text input, and image-based text extraction for a seamless multilingual experience.

projects.title: GenAI BDD Test Scenario Generator
projects.description: A web-based tool that leverages AI to automatically generate Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) test scenarios in Gherkin format. By entering user stories or feature descriptions, users receive well-structured Given–When–Then scenarios that are ready for implementation in automated testing frameworks. The tool streamlines collaboration between business analysts, developers, and QA engineers by reducing manual effort, ensuring clarity, and accelerating the test automation lifecycle.

projects.title: AI SQL Formatter & Corrector
projects.description: An intelligent tool that leverages the Google Gemini API to automatically format and correct your SQL queries. It not only beautifies your code for better readability but also identifies and fixes common errors, providing clear explanations for every change. This helps developers write cleaner, more efficient, and error-free SQL with ease.

projects.title: E-Commerce Test Automation Framework
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive UI and API test automation framework using Python, Selenium, and Pytest for a high-traffic e-commerce platform. Integrated with Jenkins for nightly regression runs.

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
